name: Lead The Charge
description:
You charge into danger, drawing the enemy’s attention and rallying your allies to strike.

Until the start of your next turn, you take –2 Defense, but all allies within medium range get +1d to their attack rolls. You may use this ability once per round.

Describe how your bold advance inspires others to join the fight.

improvements.name: Break Their Line
improvements.description: You may take an additional -3 Defense and give all allies within medium range an additional +1d to their attack rolls until the start of your next turn.
